title: Model Configuration CI Testing Configuration
description: Settings for Continuous Integration (CI) tests for model configurations repositories

markers.description: A python expression of markers to pass to model-config-tests pytests

model-config-tests-version.description: A version of the model-config-tests package

python-version.description: The python version used to create test virtual environment

^.*$.description: The name of the git branch or tag

default.description: The default configuration for this check

scheduled.description: Scheduled reproducibility checks. The keys are config tags to run scheduled checks on

reproducibility.description: Reproducibility checks. The keys are the target branch names for pull requests

qa.description: Quick quality assurance checks. The keys are the target branch names for pull requests
